Articles.Content:
Hey all, back when I started KSP the only tutorials I could find were long. So I thought I'd start making videos to help people with Kerbal Space Program. Most of my videos are short and to the point. (Usually for about 2-5 minutes).

If you're interested you can check out my tutorials here:

I've only done a few videos such as getting to the Mun, Docking, and Launching.

Not trying to spam, just trying to help out
